refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert TIFF image files to RLE.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This program converts a TIFF image to RLE5 format.

listitem.para: If specified, the output will be written to this file. If outfile.rle is "-", or if it is not specified, the output will be written to the standard output stream.
The input will be read from this file. infile.tif must be a real file, the special cases described in urt1 do not apply here.

refsect1.title: LIMITATIONS
refsect1.para:
Can't handle RGB TIFF files with a separate planar configuration.
Can't handle tiled TIFF files.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para:
Bailey Brown, University of Michigan.
Extended by David R. L. Worthington, SRI International to single channel TIFF files.
Extended by Spencer W. Thomas, University of Michigan to TIFF files with fewer than 8 bits/sample.
Requires libtiff, by Sam Leffler.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: Doesn't copy alpha channel when present.
